remarks: Rule to change the bound variable in a maps-to function, using implicit substitution.  This version of ~ cbvmpt2 allows ` B ` to be a function of ` x ` .  (Contributed by NM, 29-Dec-2014.)
statement:
cbvmpt2x.1 $e |- F/_ z B $.
cbvmpt2x.2 $e |- F/_ x D $.
cbvmpt2x.3 $e |- F/_ z C $.
cbvmpt2x.4 $e |- F/_ w C $.
cbvmpt2x.5 $e |- F/_ x E $.
cbvmpt2x.6 $e |- F/_ y E $.
cbvmpt2x.7 $e |- ( x = z -> B = D ) $.
cbvmpt2x.8 $e |- ( ( x = z /\ y = w ) -> C = E ) $.
cbvmpt2x $p |- ( x e. A , y e. B |-> C ) = ( z e. A , w e. D |-> E ) $.
$d A w x y z $.
$d B w $.
$d D y $.
$d w x y z $.
